website_summaries.verdict: One of the best ergonomic fish finders with a large, easy-to-view display screen.
pros: High-resolution sonar scanner can detect different types of fish and display information on the large, clear display screen
GPS updates five times per second
cons: Transducer size limits mounting possibilities around small boats

customer_reviews.title: The garmin gps/sonar would shutdown every 2 to 10 minutes
customer_reviews.text: The new/out of the box garmin gps/sonar would not stay on. it would shutdown every 2 to 10 minutes, I tried different circuits and different batteries. Finally, I hooked it to a battery in my garage and the same problem happened. I contacted garmin support and they sent a new backplate and power cord. The new parts did not solve the problem. After two days of installation and troubleshooting, I'm thoroughly frustrated that the device is defective. I don't know if I got a one in a thousand lemon or if more of these defective units are out there. Mine is now in a return box to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Wiggins Bunch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome unit!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome!! Love everything about this unit!! Big screen easily seen anywhere in my 18 ft boat. Great alarms, tide table charts, and accuracy when marking fish. We went dipnetting at the mouth of the Kenai river when sockeye & chinook salmon were schooling below the boat and seals were chasing them, really cool to watch on the fishfinder! Depth is extremely accurate!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Askren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i like it reads deep i have been out to about 850ft and gps seems accurate
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: I like how fast it arrived and that it arrived in ...
customer_reviews.text: I like how fast it arrived and that it arrived in good condition. I was a little disappointed that it was not packed in another box to hide what this item was. Installation was super simple. I needed a little help with wiring to my VHF, but Garmin had fantastic customer service and I was able to get it hooked up. The downside is the size of the transducer. It is so long, that I was unable to mount it on the starboard side because the propeller of my trolling motor would have hit it, so it is mounted on the port side. I will see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Depth finder and fish finder functions are so easy and worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Many different screens, charts and functions to mention. Half a season of use and I can't wait for more! Depth finder and fish finder functions are so easy and worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Original box was opened
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because was shipped in its own box, tape was broken and looked like box was open, luckily everything was there, great Garmin product , poor shipper
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!, Comes with Blue Charts installed and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great!, Comes with Blue Charts installed and I had Lake Vu HD on an Micro SD card I added to it. Using it in a 22ft Deck Boat for the Lake and occasional Trip in the River.
customer_reviews.author: DANA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This unit does the same thing as others that I have had that cost 3 times as much.
customer_reviews.author: rickr1953

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my fishing and exploring needs.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Great look. Easy to use. No engineering degree needed to install and use. Another great product from Garmin!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: We are going to the Florida keys. This will be awesome for fishing and boating!
customer_reviews.author: pamela perkins

customer_reviews.title: Great unit for the money
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t know how a person could do better for the price. Easy to use, easy to install, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Reida

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install if you have a wiring path to the transducer.
customer_reviews.text: Finding fish and mapping is what it is designed for. Have not tested it in the water yet.
customer_reviews.author: George R Faler

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Another great Garmin product, I've owned three now. Like the clarity and the high speed capabilities. The feature that let's you map out and draw your own charts in detail for a small area not already in the memory is phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: shop easy

customer_reviews.title: Software still clumsy, transducer will not work at speed
customer_reviews.text: The software for these systems is clumsy. I had hoped with a new model that they had improved it, but not that I can see. Picture is clear and clean, screen is great, directions for operation are OK but not great. Have done everything possible to make transducer work at speed -- still get nothing over 10 knots. Have consulted with experts, tried all sorts of adjustments -- NADA. Suggest you not count on much with a deep V hull and outboard.
customer_reviews.author: Alan F. Spear

customer_reviews.title: No memory.
customer_reviews.text: Do Not Buy. I did, and after installation tried to install the map upgrade. No memory. Unacceptable for a new device to have no upgrade path. Garmin response was, maps are now too large for unit. A new unit, not years old.
customer_reviews.author: Mike O

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful clear chart Garmin
customer_reviews.text: Same old button layout as my old Garmin - thats why I selected it... Very happy
customer_reviews.author: vaughan Clark

customer_reviews.title: It was a great price
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had time to use it yet, between work and weather. I will try to update after i get a chance to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Why do chips need to be so expensive? Think I understand why, just wish they were less
customer_reviews.author: Florida Biker

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived unsealed in the original manufacturer's box. The instructions and screws were coming out of the unsealed box. It was not packaged to conceal the expensive purchase and just left on my door step. I was fortunate enough to be home at the time of delivery, but due to it being unsealed with stuff coming out, I felt something could be missing or not quite right and therefore not worth my $750. I would not recommend this purchase to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Do not trust the charts
customer_reviews.text: I am giving stars for the overall system. Primarily because of the charting. Twice in the past month I have run aground with my downrigger cannon ball while using the charts. The first time I was trolling at 45 feet deep in water that was shown to be 78 feet at its shallowest point, and hit bottom with the fish finder showing a submerged island at 38 feet. My second time the charts had shown the most shallow elevation of 128 feet deep, while cruising directly over that spot, the fish finder showed 73 feet and boom! Snagged cannon ball. The fish finder depth has been on spot. Make sure to set your depth alarm and don't trust the charts.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: IT COMES WITH A COVER
customer_reviews.text: Haven't installed this yet. After installation, I might give five stars. I read all about it and also the reviews before ordering this and it sounded like it didn't come with a cover so I ordered one for it. I was disappointed that in the description of this that it didn't say anywhere that a cover came with it. I will be returning the extra cover I ordered for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lack of definition in the charts and expensive  charts cartridges.
customer_reviews.text: May be it works ok for fishing but very bad for navigation when the draft of the boat is crucial. I got stuck in the intracoastal with my sailboat due the wrong information showed in the screen. Also the price of the chars cartridges to navigate out of the USA territory is ridiculous. I deeply regret buying Garmin.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Rosado

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Worked good out of box.... mark a lot of fish with it... the gps is a must now that I've been using it....great option...
customer_reviews.author: Lars Larson

product_meta.title: Garmin Echomap Chirp 74Cv with transducer, 010-01801-01
product_meta.description: Following in the success of the echomap CHIRP Combo Series, Garmin is proud to announce the new echomap CHIRP combos with Clearly Scanning sonar technology. The CV Series offers Built-in CHIRP traditional sonar and CHIRP Clearly. The SV Series gives you Built-in CHIRP traditional sonar, CHIRP clearer and CHIRP sidevü capabilities. Each display size for the echomap combos is offered with either U.S. Bluechart G2 charts, U.S. Lakevü HD maps, Canada lakevü HD maps or a worldwide basemap. New Garmin QuickDraw contours software feature lets you create your own maps, with up to 1-foot contour lines, on any body of water.
feature_bullets: Clearer scanning sonar shows you more of what is in the water around your boat; This high frequency sonar gives near photographic images with detailed representations of objects, structure and fish
Preloaded Blue Chart g2 charts for the coastal U.S
Chirp sonar Chirp sends a continuous sweep of frequencies which provides a wider range of information; Chirp sonar is able to create crisper fish arches with better target separation
Clear scanning sonar the CV Series comes with built in 500 w Chirp traditional sonar and Chirp clearvü scanning sonar; The SV Series offers all of the same Features Plus Chirp sidevü scanning sonar
Best in class Internal 5 Hertz GPS Internal 5 Hertz GPS updates position and heading 5 times per second to make marking and returning accurately to way points easier

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars58 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Transducer, Flush mount, Protective cover, Trolling motor mount, Documentation, Power/data cable, Transom mount, Quick-release mount, Hardware, EchoMAP CHIRP 74cv
